name: sprout-track
description: Sprout Track is a self-hosted habit and activity tracker that visualizes progress with streaks and charts. Itâ€™s designed for personal growth tracking via a web UI.

features.title: Habit Tracking
features.description: Logs daily habits and activities for consistency

features.title: Streak Visualization
features.description: Displays habit streaks with calendar heatmaps

features.title: Goal Setting
features.description: Creates measurable goals with target frequencies

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Sends notifications to maintain habit consistency

features.title: Notes And Reflections

features.title: Statistics
